sentences: Rie (理衣, Rie, born 14 August 1980 in Tokyo) is a Japanese fashion model. Her management agency is Stardust Promotion, which also manages her younger sister, singer Alice.
She also has appeared in commercial for companies such as Toyota or Sapporo Beverage and in the 2006 movie Memories of Matsuko (though uncredited).
Rie appears regularly in fashion magazines as MISS and BAILA, as well as catalogues for several fashion companies in Japan.
